tenant_id.title: Tenant ID
tenant_id.description: The Tenant ID of your Microsoft Advertising developer application. Set this to "common" unless you know you need a different value.

credentials.title: Authentication Method
credentials.description: The authentication method to use to retrieve data from Microsoft Bings Ads

oneOf.title: Microsoft OAuth2.0
oneOf.description: Microsoft API Credentials for connecting to Bings Ads

client_id.title: Client ID
client_id.description: The Client ID of your Microsoft Advertising developer application.

client_secret.title: Client Secret
client_secret.description: The Client Secret of your Microsoft Advertising developer application.

refresh_token.title: Refresh Token
refresh_token.description: Refresh Token to renew the expired Access Token.

oneOf.title: Private OAuth2.0 Client
oneOf.description: Microsoft Private Client API Credentials for connecting to Bings Ads

client_id.title: Client ID
client_id.description: The Client ID of your Microsoft Advertising developer application.

client_secret.title: Client Secret
client_secret.description: The Client Secret of your Microsoft Advertising developer application.

refresh_token.title: Refresh Token
refresh_token.description: Refresh Token to renew the expired Access Token.

oneOf.title: All Accounts
oneOf.description: Replicate data from all accounts to which you have access.

oneOf.title: Specific Accounts
oneOf.description: Fetch data for subset of account IDs.

ids.title: Account IDs
ids.description: List of the account IDs from which data will be replicated.

customer_id.title: Customer ID
customer_id.description: Your Bing Customer ID. See the "Getting Started" section in the docs for information on how to obtain this ID

user_id.title: User ID
user_id.description: Bing Ads User ID. See the "Getting Started" section in the docs for information on how to obtain this ID

redirect_uri.title: Redirect URI (Optional)
redirect_uri.description: The Redirect URI of your Microsoft Advertising developer application. Leave this empty unless you know that you need it.

reports_start_date.title: Reports replication start date
reports_start_date.description: The start date from which to begin replicating report data. Any data generated before this date will not be replicated in reports. This is a UTC date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

hourly_reports.title: Enable hourly-aggregate reports
hourly_reports.description: Toggle this to enable replicating reports aggregated using an hourly time window. More information about report aggregation can be found in the docs.

daily_reports.title: Enable daily-aggregate reports
daily_reports.description: Toggle this to enable replicating reports aggregated using a daily time window. More information about report aggregation can be found in the docs.

weekly_reports.title: Enable weekly-aggregate reports
weekly_reports.description: Toggle this to enable replicating reports aggregated using a weekly time window running from Sunday to Saturday. More information about report aggregation can be found in the docs.

monthly_reports.title: Enable monthly-aggregate reports
monthly_reports.description: Toggle this to enable replicating reports aggregated using a monthly time window. More information about report aggregation can be found in the docs.
